description: Generate text using LM Studio Local LLMs.

max_tokens.info: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Set to 0 for unlimited tokens.

base_url.info: Endpoint of the LM Studio API. Defaults to 'http://localhost:1234/v1' if not specified.

api_key.info: The LM Studio API Key to use for LM Studio.

seed.info: The seed controls the reproducibility of the job.
